headline: 6 tenants disclosed material events this week. 2 moved to critical status, 4 improved or show positive momentum.

portfolio_verdict.statement: Risk increased modestly this week, driven by two isolated tenant liquidity events. No systemic deterioration detected.

narrative_bullets.text: Retail exposure deteriorated this week due to two unrelated tenant liquidity events.
Private tenant Urban Fitness abruptly closed 8 locationsâ€”portfolio exposure at 2 properties.
Willowbrook Plaza now has 3 tenants on watch list, representing 60% of rent share.
Positive momentum at Gateway Industrial: BlueSky Manufacturing expansion offsets Continental Logistics risk.
No new bankruptcy filings this week across monitored tenants.

concentration_insights.text: Retail tenants account for 67% of all watch-list exposure.
Willowbrook Plaza contains 40% of portfolio credit risk signals this week.
Three tenants with going concern warnings appear across five properties.

exec_questions: What is our contingency plan if Apex Retail seeks rent relief or files Chapter 11?
Should we accelerate tenant diversification efforts at Willowbrook Plaza given the concentration of watch-list tenants?
Do we expect follow-on disclosures from Northstar Apparel regarding specific store closures?
